pages.title: ⎧ Eight of Wands ⎧
pages.text: Spirit of Swiftness$(br)  ☿ Mercury in ♐ Sagittarius

The card represents motion through the immovable - the staves seem static at first, but they are flying though an open field, drawing to the term of their course.$(br)  That which they signify is at hand; it may be even on the threshold.$(br)  They are parallel and equal, suggesting that in life, there are many equal possibilities; we may not need to choose only one and exclude the others.$(br)  Like a painting with only

one color, a one tone life is dull, if not incomprehensible.$(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Movement, purpose, things coming to their conclusion.$(br)  Variety of possibilities without the need to choose one over the other.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Possible delays, internal dispute, stingings of conscience.$(br)  Sometimes, the need to make a choice.
